amendment.description: In the nature of a substitute.

action.text: Motion by Senator Schumer to reconsider the vote by which cloture on amendment SA 3867, as modified, was not invoked (Record Vote No. 473) entered in Senate.
Cloture on amendment SA 3867, as modified, not invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 51. Record Vote Number: 473.
Cloture motion on amendment SA 3867, as modified, presented in Senate.
Amendment SA 3867 proposed by Senator Reed. (consideration: S8543-8756, S8756-8757; text as modified: CR S8543-8756) In the nature of a substitute.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Cloture on amendment SA 3867, as modified, not invoked in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 51. Record Vote Number: 473.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3867 proposed by Senator Reed.
